content.rendered:
Saktima has worked in the UK Higher Education Sector since 2010, gradually accumulating her extensive knowledge and experience covering all administrative functions within registry department, supporting student’s journey from Reception to Graduation and beyond by ensuring the smooth operational academic delivery in working with senior management team. She joined Regent College London since 2018 with a passion to support student and staff in achieving one common goal, the success stories of our student and our lifelong achievement.

Her key responsibilities are to manage the activities of the Assessment department under the direction of the Head of Assessment to provide accurate, effective and responsive services to academic colleagues in line with University Partnerships. Her quest is to remove any barriers that may hinder student’s achievement within regulations.
